lines.text: In 1986, when Ko Chun hadn't obtained the crown of the God of Gamblers yet, he had to face the most life-risking and hazardous challenge of his life.
Whoever loses should have his hands cut off.
Do you have to go that far?
I want to get back what belongs to me.
[after Ko Chun and Ko Ngo bet on their hands during the final match]
I won't join you! You're nuts! I prefer saving my hands for squeezing a woman's tits!

[narrating]
Since that following day, Ko Chun has seldom been seen by the public. Many people tell me about the legends of Ko Chun. Someone told me he has two students, Dagger and Sing. Some people say he appeared in Nepal with Seven, but no one knows which saying is correct.
[after Seven, Lone Ng, and So walk into a casino wearing suits]
By the way, if those guards come back for revenge, what do we do?
I haven't thought of this question. When I kick after eating, those guys would have to wake up 4 to 5 hours later.
